  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.event.plugin.ScalaPluginDisableEvent
    this event will not be called on Paper servers. Use regular PluginDisableEvent instead.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.event.plugin.ScalaPluginEnableEvent
    It is impractical to maintain this event. For instance, it is *not* called on Paper servers on reloads. Use regular PluginEnableEvent instead.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.compat.IScalaLoader.runInMainThread(Runnable)
    This method is only used by deprecated methods, and thus is no longer needed. Should you need equivalent functionality, then use the following snippet: 
                     
                     if (Bukkit.isPrimaryThread()) {
                         runnable.run();
                     } else {
                         Bukkit.getScheduler().runTask(scalaLoader, runnable);
                     }
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.configurationserializable.runtime.RuntimeConversions.clearCodecs(IScalaPluginClassLoader)
    internal use only.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.paper.plugin.ScalaPluginClassLoader.addURL(URL)
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.paper.ScalaLoader.runInMainThread(Runnable)
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.description.ScalaVersion.getScalaLibraryUrl()
    Starting from Scala 3, the runtime is larger than just a standard and reflection library. Use ScalaVersion.getUrls() instead.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.description.ScalaVersion.getScalaReflectUrl()
    Starting from Scala 3, the runtime is larger than just a standard and reflection library. Use ScalaVersion.getUrls() instead.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.PluginScalaVersion.getScalaLibraryUrl()
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.PluginScalaVersion.getScalaReflectUrl()
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPlugin.getClassLoader()
    This method *WILL NOT EXIST* at runtime when running your plugin on Paper. Use ScalaPlugin.classLoader() instead.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPlugin.getPluginLoader()
    use ScalaPlugin.pluginLoader() instead.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginClassLoader.addURL(URL)
    use libraries instead. The only reason this method still exist is that that method does not support user-defined repositories yet.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginClassLoader.injectIntoJavaPluginLoaderScope(String, Class<?>)
    JavaPlugins that try to find classes using the JavaPluginLoader expect to only find JavaPlugins.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginClassLoader.removeFromJavaPluginLoaderScope(String)
    JavaPlugins that try to find classes using the JavaPluginLoader expect to only find JavaPlugins
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginDescription.addYaml(Map<String, Object>)
    internal use only
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginDescription.getMain()
    internal use only
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginDescription.getScalaVersion()
    internal use only
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginDescription.setApiVersion(String)
    internal use only
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginDescription.setMain(String)
    internal use only
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginDescription.setScalaVersion(String)
    internal use only
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginLoader.forceLoadAllClasses(ScalaPlugin)
    Use ScalaPluginLoader.openUpToJavaPlugin(ScalaPlugin, JavaPlugin) instead. This method used to inject classes from the ScalaPlugin into the 'global' JavaPluginLoader scope, so that JavaPlugins could find classes from the ScalaPlugin. But since it no longer does that, it has no use to call this method anymore. This method will be removed in a future version!
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginLoader.getEventBus()
    use IScalaLoader.getEventBus() instead.
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.ScalaPluginLoader.openUpToJavaPlugin(ScalaPlugin, JavaPlugin)
    use IScalaPluginLoader.openUpToJavaPlugin(IScalaPlugin, JavaPlugin) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.event.EventBus(PluginManager)
    not meant to be constructed explicitly. Use IScalaPlugin.getEventBus() or IScalaLoader.getEventBus().
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.PluginScalaVersion(String, String, String)
    since Scala 3 there are more artifacts than just the scala standard library and the scala reflection library
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    xyz.janboerman.scalaloader.plugin.description.ScalaVersion.v2_11_12
    provided for those who wish to use it, but the Scala 2.11 series has been unsupported for a while now.
